comment: Very smart but not good at communicating. Talks way too fast and erases the board before you can finish writing down notes. The homework is not turned in and is just textbook exercises that he does not go over. Tests are very hard even with the curve. I strongly advise against taking him.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Get ready to read--TEST HEAVY

comment: Extremely intelligent, very fast in his explanations. He expects you to read the material and come to class with a solid foundation. His lectures are usage lectures, not teaching you the concepts. There is no easy way to teach this class, he encourages you to implement via the tests. Really makes you think, curve is appropriate. Learned alot.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--TEST HEAVY--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: This class is an absolute disaster with Zhang. Expect test averages to be around the 30s and 40s, and don't expect to be able to take notes easily. Most people resort to taking pictures with their phone. You will have to teach yourself, and be very fast to finish the test. Most people literally couldn't finish the tests in time. Run away fast

Super nice guy, but lectures extremely fast. He quickly writes a complicated problem on the board while attempting to explain it as he goes. You spend 100% of your brain power trying to write everything down in time and and 0% on hearing and understanding. I spent a lot of time on YouTube to better understand the material. Tests are very hard.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--TEST HEAVY--Tests are tough

comment: Lectures are fast-paced and he often makes mistakes doing examples. Tests are 12 questions worth 10 points each, but are incredibly difficult. Open notes and open book but it doesn't help much. TAKE LOTS OF DETAILED NOTES. He knows the material well but is a horrible teacher. He will curve your final grade if you do reasonably well on the final.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--TEST HEAVY--Tests are tough

comment: First off, you need the book but don't buy it it is crazy expensive, rent it from amazon. He isn't the best at communicating so you are going to need to self study a lot even if you take detailed notes in class and can use them on tests. Attendance  is necessary every day if you don't want to fail.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Get ready to read--TEST HEAVY

comment: Hard to understand(& dirty handwriting)-doesn't explain grading criteria well-not available even in office hours-tough grader-takes attendance randomly-gives study guide but not really helpful for test-homework not collected-unplanned semester(he is not sure when tests would be or what will be covered in the test even couple of days before test)

This teacher is horrendous. He's difficult to understand, can't copy an example problem from the book without making mistakes, and doesn't plan tests early enough to space them out. We had test 4 the last class period before the final. He gives 14 problems on a test and only requires 10 to get 100, but there is no clear grading scale for them.

Be prepared to study and work on your own. All of his exams are open book and open note but the exams can be difficult even with these. He usually explains stuff in class pretty well and is pretty generous with partial credit on exams. He will always answer questions if you have them in class.

Horrible professor.  He filled the board with formulas and didn't bother explaining them.  Made numerous mistakes in examples and wouldn't go back and fix them.  Spoke very quickly, very thick accent, and mumbled.  If you actually need to learn anything, take another professor.  If you already know the material and just need credit, you might be ok
Dr Zhang is a very nice guy and he probably knows this material, but you will be teaching yourself in this class. By far the worst class I have ever had and I have 180 credit hours so far.

He has a thick accent. He will blaze through the material and explain very little. He will take the examples in the book and work them out on the board while making occasional mistakes. Questions are ignored or he will point to the board (if he hasn't erased it yet). Wolfram & Khan Academy are the only reasons I passed. GOOD LUCK. You will need it.
